Uses of Interface
com.orchestranetworks.ui.UIJavaScriptWriter

Packages that use UIJavaScriptWriter
com.orchestranetworks.ui Provides the capability to create custom user interface components that are integrated within EBX5.  
com.orchestranetworks.ui.form This package allows customizing forms.  
 

Uses of UIJavaScriptWriter in com.orchestranetworks.ui
 

Subinterfaces of UIJavaScriptWriter in com.orchestranetworks.ui
 interface UIAjaxContext
          Encapsulates an HTTP response so that an Ajax component is able to generate its part of the DHTML page.
 interface UIComponentWriter
          This interface offers common user interface methods to create standard EBX5 components.
 interface UIResponseContext
          Encapsulates a HTTP response so that a bean editor is able to generate its part of the DHTML page, including the building of standard EBX5 components.
 interface UIServiceComponentWriter
          In the context of UI services, this interface allows building standard EBX5 components.
 interface UITableFilterResponseContext
          Encapsulates an HTTP request in order to display a table filter.
 

Methods in com.orchestranetworks.ui that return UIJavaScriptWriter
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIResponseContext.addJS_getNodeValue(Path aPath)
          Adds JavaScript code to get the current value of a node as set in the form.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIResponseContext.addJS_setNodeValue(String aVarName, Path aPath)
          Adds JavaScript code to set the value of a node from a JavaScript variable.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS(String aJavaScriptCode)
          Adds some text to the JavaScript stream.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_cr()
          Adds a carriage return to the JavaScript stream.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_cr(String aJavaScriptCode)
          Adds some text, then adds a carriage return to the JavaScript stream.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_openPreviewImage(String imageURL)
          Opens an image preview panel for the given image URL.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_openPreviewImageFromVar(String varName)
          Opens an image preview panel from a JavaScript var containing the image URL.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_setButtonDisabled(String buttonElement, String isDisabled)
          Disable or enable a button.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_setExpandCollapseBlockExpanded(String expandCollapseBlockId, String isExpanded)
          Expand or collapse an expand/collapse block.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIJavaScriptWriter.addJS_setStateToToggleButton(String buttonElement, String state)
          Set the state to a toggle button.
 

Uses of UIJavaScriptWriter in com.orchestranetworks.ui.form
 

Subinterfaces of UIJavaScriptWriter in com.orchestranetworks.ui.form
 interface UIFormPaneWriter
          Encapsulates an HTTP response so that a form layout is able to generate its part of the page, including the building of standard model-driven widgets.
 

Methods in com.orchestranetworks.ui.form that return UIJavaScriptWriter
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIFormPaneWriter.addJS_getNodeValue(Path aPath)
          Adds JavaScript code to get the current value of a node, as set in the form.
 UIJavaScriptWriter UIFormPaneWriter.addJS_setNodeValue(String aVarName, Path aPath)
          Adds JavaScript code to set the value of a node from a JavaScript variable.
